item.name: Physics Careers
item.info: Dr. Franks from the Career Design Center will join us to talk about careers in physics and what resources are available on campus for finding jobs! We'll also unveil a project we'll be working on with the Career Design Center over the course of the semester. If time permits, SPS President, Evan Ott, will present his research from this summer at Sandia National Laboratories.

item.name: Dr. Willy Fischler
item.info: Join SPS as we welcome UT Physics professor Dr. Willy Fischler! He will be talking about research, life, and more! His reseach interests include: "quantum field theory, supersymmetry, string theory, quantum cosmology, and statistical mechanics" his website

item.name: Sense Corp Hiring
item.info:
Dr. Franks from the Career Design Center passed on some information about a mid-sized consulting firm that is interested in hiring students with a strong background in mathematics after being extremely impressed with two math students last year. They will be at the McCombs (business school) Undergraduate Career Expo on the 11th. Attire requirements are here and list of all employers attending is hereSense Corp is a fast-growing team of exceptionally talented consultants. Our people are the best and brightest talent from leading firms and universities. The founder and many employees of Sense Corp are UT graduates, and we value UT's campus to provide quality consultants for our company. Our firm is committed to making a difference by working together with our clients on multi-level business challenges. Our strength comes from the people we hire; and we, therefore strongly support each individual's professional development. You will quickly learn to become a leader as you gain increasing responsibilities to help our clients in a broad spectrum of industries.

Information about job postings for Sense Corp can be found on our website here, and you can direct any and all questions to ruth.franks@austin.utexas.edu.
